page.title: 10Law and Order In Blacon
page.content: There is only one{police station}in Blacon.{Shoplifting}is quite common. It is usually done by teenagers between the ages of twelve to eighteen and sometimes younger.Other crimes include{vandalism}and{burglary.}Blacon has a high crime rate compared to other areas of Chester. An example of burglary occurred on June 10th 1985.The burglars took a {video}and a{colour televion}and some {jewellery}from a house in Sumner Road. The police arrived with a{forensic {scientist}to investigate the crime but no one was arrested. There are no{courts}in Blacon but there are plenty of policemen.There is a rumour that in Blacon there have been lots of{kidnappings.}Children have been taken away by strangers in cars.
